name: GRO Revitalizing Shampoo for Thinning Hair
about: What it is: A clinically tested shampoo that smooths, adds shine and strengthens thinning strands without weighing them down. The formula supports hair that looks and feels thicker, fuller and healthier...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:- Thinning.- Shine.- Color Safe..Key Benefits: - Sets the foundation for thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair.- Strengthens hair to reduce breakage.- Cleanses and removes buildup..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Biomimetic Peptides and Caffeine: Stimulate and nourish the scalp..- Biotin: Strengthens hair to reduce breakage..- Karmatin: A vegan keratin alternative, formulated without silicones, that adds hydration, strength and shine without the weight...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated for those with thinning hair, this shampoo features powerful phytoactives and Karmatin, a vegan keratin alternative, that cleanse, strengthen and smooth strands while enhancing shine. Biomimetic peptides and caffeine stimulate and nourish the scalp for a root-to-tip lather and rinse...Fragrance Description: A fresh, citrusy blend with soft floral undertones...Clinical Results: In a controlled hair swatch study using GRO Revitalizing Shampoo and Conditioner:..- 79% reduction in breakage after one use..- 5x stronger strands after one use...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Fragrance/Parfum, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Chloride, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Decyl Glucoside, Panthenol, Mannitol, Phosphatidylcholine, Glycerin, Biotin, Ximenia Americana Seed Oil, sr-(Spider Polypeptide-1 Oligopeptide-178), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Ceramide NP, Sorbitan Oleate, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Citric Acid, Caffeine, Xanthan Gum, Alanine, Cetrimonium Chloride, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Linalyl Acetate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tromethamine, Hydrochloric Acid, Dipotassium Phosphate, Potassium Phosphate, Serine, Valine, Threonine, Isoleucine, Proline, Phytosphingosine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-9, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-86, Nicotiana Benthamiana Octapeptide-30 sh-Oligopeptide-2.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..- Lather a quarter-size amount of shampoo onto wet hair from scalp to ends..- Massage in..- Leave in for 1 minute..- Rinse..- Follow with GRO Revitalizing Conditioner for best results.

reviews.review_title: Would buy this just for the scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour's revitalizing shampoo has become an essential part of my hair care routine, and for good reason. From the moment I first used it, I could feel its gentle yet effective cleansing power working wonders on my strands. What I love most about this shampoo is its focus on not only cleaning my hair but also strengthening it from within. The inclusion of biomimetic peptides, caffeine, and biotin provides a nourishing and stimulating experience for my scalp, promoting healthier hair growth and reducing breakage. The addition of Karmatin, a vegan keratin alternative, adds hydration, strength, and shine without weighing my hair downu2014a perfect solution for those with thinning strands like mine. Plus, knowing that it's vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free gives me peace of mind about the ingredients I'm using on my hair. The fragrance is a delightful blend of fresh citrus with soft floral undertones, leaving my hair smelling fresh and revitalized after each wash. Overall, Vegamour's revitalizing shampoo is a must-have for anyone looking to support thicker, fuller, and healthier-looking hair.

reviews.review_text: I'm impressed! Not only does it smell amazing, but it has visibly improved the thickness and texture of my hair. My hair feels stronger, looks fuller, and the natural ingredients make me feel good about using it regularly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shampoo and conditioner set from Sephora as a perk. I also bought the leave-in conditioner because some of the reviews I read commented about how dry their hair was afterwards. DISASTER!!! I used it twice this week as directed with the leave-in conditioner, and my hair fell out in clumps and Iu2019m shocked at all the broken strands of hair!!! It was like I had put glue on my salon-highlighted blonde hair. I couldnu2019t even run my fingers through my hair the second time. Ugh. My hair is horribly damaged from this line. When I returned the leave-in conditioner I bought, the cashier told me she and none of the staff like it at all either. For context, I gave colour treated hair and buy high quality brands u2014 Oribe, Kerastase, B&V, Olaplex, etc. Iu2019m so upset I ever tried this once let alone gave it a second shot. Please beware if you have highlighted, colour treated hair and/or thin and drier hair because you live in a drier climate.
Made my scalp itch dry and flaky. My hair was fry and tangled not buying again and saw no new hair growth. I saw it falling out even more than usual.

reviews.review_title: Worth it if you can afford it

reviews.review_text: I got a free sample of this. It had enough for tree washes. This shampoo definately makes my hair more bouncy and dense. However, the price point is a bit exagerated. I will probably buy it again because it works and the smell is kind of worth it, but anyone on a budget can find more afordable options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a little sample of this and the conditioner to try and I'm not able to use it consistently enough yet to see if it helps with thickness but I can say that the smell is absolutely wonderful and I'd probably try a full bottle based on that alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very strong citrus scent in here, which is almost too much for me, however the shampoo itself is quite good. Sulfate-free shampoos are always a hit or miss for me, this one is the former: cleanses well and doesn't leave my hair dry or frizzy. Like the 'Gro Serum' there are good ingredients in here (Aloe, Glycine, Biotin etc) but UNLIKE it, there is no alcohol at all (Cetyl alcohol in the ingredients list is an emollient) meaning I have no hesitations in using or recommending this product. I didn't see any textural differences to my hair whilst using this, although breakage was less than before. I definitely prefer the shampoo over the serum. A bit pricey though!   ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: u2018Nuxeu2019 u2013 Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: u2018Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it once in a sample size and it's actually good made my hair soft and bouncy. I cannot tell if it actually helps  for hair thinning yet. The smell is really strong so if you are sensitive you might wanna pass but I don't mind it since I like the smell. It is also color safe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Vegamour products!! This is another great one. The smell is so good like floral citrus scent and it is intoxicating. I'm not sure yet how the growth benefit is yet, as I have only had it a week. But, I have used the hydrate and repair and it works really well and makes my hair so soft and manageable. I need the growth and I need the repair so I use the growth shampoo and the hydrate and repair conditioner/mask. Just after my first wash my hair felt so clean and was so soft and smelled so good. Vegamour will be the ONLY shampoo and conditioner I ever use. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and so far so good but it smells exactly like satsuma from the body shopu2026. Like EXACTLYu2026 and itu2019s very strong, a little off putting for me.

reviews.review_title: Please go back to 3 oz travel sized bottles.

reviews.review_text: I'm giving this one star because I bought the mini thinking it would be a travel size bottle of the product. I never used this before so I thought I would get the smaller version to try it. My shampoo was an actual sample size (1.6 oz) and there is not enough product to make a decision one way or another as to whether it works or not. I am completely disappointed that I  wasted my money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

It lathers very well and makes my hair look shiny & smooth. I compliment this with its conditioner to soften and lock the moisture. Overall itu2019s a great shampoo and will definitely repurchase it.

reviews.review_text: I am in love with Vegamour GRO Revitalizing shampoo and conditioner duo! Works great for my dry hair and sensitive scalp. I love the way my hair looks after I use it - soft, hydrated and bright! I would highly recommend this product to my friends and family!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

Iu2019m excited to keep trying and see what it does for hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Vegamour for consideration but all opinions are my own. I only tried the smaller size so I'm going off that. I really like the scent which is kinda fresh citrusy which was nice for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used The revitalizing shampoo several times and it cleanses my scalp extremely well.  After washing it off my hair  feels smooth. It has a wonderful citrus scent. The fallout of hair is less & less each time. Definitely will continue using to see benefits of promoting  hair growth. Gifted by Vegmour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited when Revitalizing Shampoo GRO was gifted by Vegamour for me to try it. I have been suffering from thinning hair and I have been looking for. A shampoo that could help control the problem. I have been using Vegamour serum and it is amazing so I knew the shampoo would great. After a few uses I noticed less hair loss in the shower and more volume in general. Also my hair looked more manageable and healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo has a really nice smell: fruity, citrusy and sweet. The consistency is not thick, itu2019s almost watery. The shampoo lathers well and leaves my hair clean (but not squeaky clean, which I appreciate). The packaging feels high quality, thereu2019s a protective seal on the tube to prevent leaking, it has to be removed before the first use. I havenu2019t noticed the change in my hair growth yet as Iu2019ve been using for just 2 weeks, but I have nothing bad to say about this product. My hair feels sleek and looks shiny, itu2019s so smooth that it almost looks flat. I think it would be a great product for someone whose hair is hard to control as it can help make it more manageable. Complimentary from Vegamour in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_title: Super smooth and soft hair after
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been on the hunt for the perfect shampoo and I am so glad I found this one. I have used Vegamour hair growth oil and their conditioner and they are amazing separately but also really amazing together and I have noticed my hair get more full ever since damaging my hair. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Vegamour! First time using this brand and Iu2019m obsessed. Adorable, easy to use packaging and the product smells amazing! Love the shampoo and conditioner and how it makes my hair feel and smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Introducing the GRO Revitalizing Shampoo, a gentle cleanser that makes your hair look thicker and fuller. Its vital ingredient is plant-based phytoactives which reduce signs of shedding and improve hair density. The shampoo also contains Karmatin, a vegan alternative to keratin that didn't make a noticeable difference after the first use. However, my hair felt the same as if I had just returned from the salon and had replenished shine from root to tip. The shampoo is color-safe and formulated without harmful chemicals and sulfates, resulting in healthier-looking hair. complimentary from vegamour

reviews.review_text: Gifted by vegamour. I air dried my hair and it was shiny and pretty. have only used this shampoo once so far so this is a first impressions review! I cannot get over how lovely the scent is. Maybe grapefruit-Ish? I love it. Excited to keep using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Swapped this for the full shampoo from living proof after change of ingredients causing more shedding. I have been using this for 4 weeks. I want to mention during this time and previous to this I was taking 2 scoops of collagen peptides and I have pcos.  The first two washes I noticed this left my hair feeling dry as if Iu2019ve been in the pool. I donu2019t use conditioner only leave in on my ends just find it works better than washing off conditioner. My scalp was itchy the next morning and developed some acne.  2nd week of using I found you have to really massage this in to your scalp where it emulsifies well and thoroughly wash it out in order for my scalp not break out or itch. I had a ton of hair fall out during this week like clumps of hair in the shower, while brushing, and the next morning.  This looked about 200-300 strands of hair I have medium length hair fine wavy hair. I was also showering every night as I did for my previous shampoo.   3rd & 4th week Iu2019ve been able to shower every other night rather than every night, scalp doesnu2019t get oily or flat. My 2B waves come naturally without lots of frizz, a tremendous amount of change to hair loss I only brush before showering and comb from back to front with a leave in conditioner which looks about 100 strands of hair after only brushing every other night. And about 10-50 strands of hair in the shower.   Iu2019m going to continue using this shampoo and will try out the hair oil next u2728

reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for products that will help you hair grow and revitalize this is IT. Not to mention it smells like natural citrus which is absolutely AMAZING . Ive gotten so many compliments on how shiny my hair looks and how amazing it smells in the last few weeks. I have thin, fine hair and generally go three days between washes so I want a shampoo that can really clean. Overall, I liked the product, but Iu2019m not sure Iu2019d purchase again at the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just want to start off by saying I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.   Now that we got that out of the way, I donu2019t hate this shampoo, but I donu2019t think itu2019s right for my hair type either. When I used it, my hair fell very flat (it never felt heavy but it was clearly weighed down by how flat it fell). It also felt greasy by day 2 which isnu2019t usually the case for me. I tried it with leave in conditioner, without leave in, with foam volumizer, without it, etc., and nothing helped to give my hair more volume. Once I went back to my regular shampoo, my hair felt much cleaner and healthier. Again, I donu2019t think this was because this shampoo is terrible, I think itu2019s just not right for my hair type. Iu2019m also a sulfate girl, so put that into consideration when reading my review.   On the plus side, it did leave my hair with a beautiful shine (which may have been partially due to the conditioner as well), so I kind of hate that it didnu2019t work out for me. It smells great too (very citrusy), but if youu2019re not into strong scents, you might want to skip this one.

reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of the shampoo from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. The packaging alone is nice and easy to use, and itu2019s a beautiful shade of pink. As for the product itself, it lathers up nicely on the scalp and itu2019s easy to rinse out. When i am out of the shower and my hair is drying/dried, the shampoo does not weight my curls down; it still gives me some volume which I like because I have thin and fine hair. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because while my hair looks voluminous, i donu2019t see a difference in length or density, and I donu2019t see a reduced amounts of shedding (it also may be because I have sample sizes and results donu2019t usually happen overnight). So overall, I recommend this shampoo because it left my hair shiny, soft, and didnu2019t mess up my curl pattern. I think this is something I would be willing to try in the full size to see if I get more benefits from the shampoo.

reviews.review_title: works for volumizing but not my favorite shampoo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to Vegamour products. Due to some unusual hair loss Iu2019ve had over the past year, Iu2019ve noticed some thinning in my hair so Iu2019ve been trying a lot of hair care products that are new to me to help with that. Iu2019ve heard mixed reviews about the Vegamour shampoo and conditioning set but I decided to give the Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo & Conditioner for Thinning Hair & Hair Wellness a try.  The Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo & Conditioner for Thinning Hair & Hair Wellness comes in a pretty light pink easy to use squeeze bottle that looks great on the shelf and dispenses the products properly. The shampoo itself smells great and has a nice thick texture but spreads and lathers easily.  I noticed that the Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo is a little more drying than some of the other volumizing shampoos Iu2019ve tried but it works well for my hair. I wouldnu2019t use it more than once a week because of how drying it isu2026 for me, I think cleansing shampoo rules apply here. I didnu2019t notice a lot of differences but my hair did feel fuller and the shampoo helped with the oiliness of my hair.  Overall, I wasnu2019t upset about the Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo & Conditioner for Thinning Hair & Hair Wellness set. It works pretty well for me. I think that some of the people that are experiencing breakage or fallout might already have dry hair so the additional dryness from this shampoo just isnu2019t working for their hair type. I personally didnu2019t notice this in my experience but I also noticed how drying the product was for my hair and adapted my usage. I would cautiously recommend the Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo & Conditioner for Thinning Hair & Hair Wellness set to anyone fighting hair loss with oily hair keeping in mind that everyoneu2019s hair care needs are unique. It's a little pricey for a shampoo but it's in line with most shampoos for hair loss issues.

reviews.review_text: Absolute obsessing over this product, Iu2019ve been using it for a while and I can totally see an improvement. I have a really thin curly hair and this has been such a game changer, Iu2019ve been also using the conditioner and the biotin Gummies which might be why I can see such a big difference but overall this brand delivers what they promise.

It doesnu2019t clutter or form clumps up like it did, less tangles and itu2019s not as dry as it was. The combo of Vegamour GRO seems to have done its work. reviews.review_text: A shampoo that is worth the hype, for real. Wow this scent is absolutely beautiful! A fresh citrus that smells so clean, Iu2019m excited to use it each time! This shampoo gives a nice lather and incredible shine!

reviews.review_title: My MAN noticed a difference lol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You know whatever youu2019re doing or using is working when your partner notices a difference lol! I use this once a week and I love the smell, it doesnu2019t dry out my scalp or anything which I love. Just a few hours ago my fiance says to me u201cbabe I know this sounds weird but your hair got very longu201d I immediately had to write this review because it takes a while for him to notice changes lol. If youu2019re struggling with hair loss, want thicker hair, or just want long hair (like me) I would 100% recommend this shampoo. I use other products in my hair like I donu2019t use the vegamour oils or conditioners..but after seeing what Iu2019m seeing with just the shampoo, I honestly might get them too which Iu2019m sure Iu2019ll see quicker results. But I will say for those of you who are thinking about buying this and debating, please be patient. I know we want to see over night results but it does take time to really see a difference. Iu2019ve been using this shampoo for 3 months now I would say and Iu2019m very happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was just okay to me. Not the best but not the worst either. I will say that it smelled really really good! Just like a grape sweet tart. I would compare it to like redkin shampoo. I received this free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted. I recently went from black to a silver under dye and was looking for a shampoo/conditioner system that was color safe and sensitive to my hair concerns. This Vegamour shampoo was not only great for my colored hair but also did not irritate my sensitive scalp! The travel sizes are so super convenient to carry for vacationing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great shampoo! I love the fact that itu2019s Vegan and the smell is really nice, like a citrusy feel! It seems to get rid of a lot of buildup in my hair and itu2019s very easy to apply! I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo has a very luscious lather and smells absolutely incredible! Itu2019s a very intoxicating scent that I canu2019t quite put my nose on, a little bit fruity and floral. You donu2019t need much of this shampoo to clean your hair and get a rich lather. I have very long hair and I use about a quarter sized amount. It really feels luxurious and gentle on the scalp but gives the hair a nice clean. It feels very nourishing and hydrating, which is what I need for my color treated and heat styled hair. It definitely makes my hair feel stronger, look healthier, and gives my hair a nice shine. It makes my hair very brushable and smooth. This is a formula I will definitely be continuing to use again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this shampoo , feels soft and silky best part this shampoo is gentle to your hair leaves a clean scalp fully recommended this product

I have really fine and then hair. Iu2019m super particular about my hair care products. After I used these my hair felt really nice and not weighed down Buy a bunch of unnecessary chemicals. Definitely going to continue using

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this shampoo. It has a refreshing scent and leaves my hair feeling clean but not stripped. It is quite expensive for what it is though, and so I do wish it were a bit more affordable.

I have thinning hair an I look forward to prolonged results. So far Iu2019m loving the feel of this an my hair has more life to it.

reviews.review_text: I received this free from vegamour. I love the citrus scent of this! I could smell it even after showering the next day! The vegan keratin left my hair feeling soft and smooth after the first use. The shampoo lathered so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo has been extremely nice for my fine straight damaged hair! I have been experiencing some hormonal hair loss so I grabbed this looking for help. My hair does seem to be getting thicker so I think it's working. My hair is also extra shiny since I've started using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the Gro Revitalizing shampoo and I truly enjoyed it.  A little goes a long way, so you are definitely saving product and making it last.  It lathered super well and left my hair feeling cleansed and stronger, definitely noticed less shedding. Really liked that itu2019s cruelty free and vegan.  It also smells super good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo & Conditioner smells really good but it didn't work as well like I thought. I wish it was a bit more smoothing to my hair. Either that or my hair is super damaged and it could grasp on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this shampoo.  It has a rich lather and does not take a lot of product to cover my hair.  I work it into the scalp and it has a fresh scent that is not overpowering.  My hair looks a little fuller which is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is very potent and smells just like candy. I actually really like it but might put sensitive noses off. reviews.review_text: I have thin, fine, colored hair and this is a lightweight shampoo that leaves hair feeling clean and not bogged down. So Iu2019m excited to see the long term difference it makes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Left my hair feeling very soft and nourished only after a few uses. It also helped a lot with dandruff and left my scalp super clean without stripping it of moisture. Highly recommend if you have thinning hair!

reviews.review_text: I was skeptical when I received a free sample of Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo for testing purposes. I have a favorite go-to shampoo that Iu2019ve used for years but I gave it a try. First off, it smells great! It reminds me of PEZ candy. I had to use more product to generate a lather than my usual shampoo but my hair felt clean and smelled great. It also curled extremely well, like much better than normal. I thought maybe it was a fluke but I had the same great experience with the second wash. Iu2019m definitely going to buy this in the future. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo. I have been using this for a while and I have noticed that my hair is healthy and I have less hairfall. The natural citrus scent is so refreshing. I cannot wait to use it and see the long term results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the trial sizes for review purposes, they are the perfect size for travel! I packed these in my gym bag and used them up in about two weeks - the formula is lightweight yet hydrating. I really love the slight scent it has, and would definitely try the full size. Hard to tell if itu2019s helped with hair growth alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a nice shampoo. I like the consistency and scent. My hair feels clean after using it. It seems to work well, although I havenu2019t used it very long.  Also, I wonder if you have to always use this shampoo to maintain the hair growth.   *I received this for free from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclosure: I have always purchased this directly from Vegamour, but I was SO excited to see it at Sephora where I do all the rest of my cosmetic/skincare purchases. Also, Iu2019m reviewing this solely for its qualities as a shampoo and NOT speaking to its efficacy in hair growth and renewal. It may be helpful in that regard, but Iu2019m taking specific supplements and using an infrared growth and renewal cap so I canu2019t speak to which element gives me the greatest result. I lost hair by the handfuls when I had Covid and had a mishap lighting a gas fireplace where I burned off the front of my hair to the scalp from about the front of my hairline and back a couple of inches. (And my eyebrows and eyelashes too.) I had significant hair loss to recover from. Itu2019s been nearly two years, and Iu2019ve grown back most of my hair, and itu2019s actually thicker than it was before I had Covid.  Back to the Vegamour shampoo. It is simply the BEST shampoo that Iu2019ve EVER used. The texture of my hair is so silky and glossy after using it. It is volume boosting and so easy to style after using this shampoo. The lather is unbelievable. It takes a pea sized amount to get full lather on my hair, which is a chin length bob for volume reference. (My teenage daughter has incredibly thick curly long hair and only uses just a bit more than I do with each shampoo and gets amazing lather.) The fragrance is subtle, clean with no heavy artificial fragrance. Even my husband has commented on how amazing my hair look both after blowing out and when I let my hair dry with my natural wave with the Vegamour shampoo. Yes, itu2019s pricey, but a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my review. Ever since I had Covid in 2021, my hair has been thinning. After just a few weeks of using this shampoo I can already tell a difference, the amount of hair fall in the shower has radically decreased and my hair looks thicker and feels less dry and brittle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a month and I have not noticed a difference in the thickness of my hair. My hair is curly and for typical curls I would say itu2019s 3B. The smell reminds me of like a typical soap from Lush. I donu2019t have to use a lot of product to wash all my hair and it still leaves my hair with a lot of moisture. Iu2019m going to continue using it.

It left my scalp feeling clean and my strands slightly dry. Iu2019m not sure if it helped with growth, but maybe I would see results with long term use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

It did seem to make my hair feel pretty dry after rinsing, but once I used the conditioner it felt soft and silky. Once I dried my hair, I noticed how full of volume it looked! It made my hair look and feel clean and full of life. I only received a trial size, so I didnu2019t notice any growth, but I plan on buying the full size and seeing what results I get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this shampoo! Canu2019t say enough good things about it honestly, I use it in combination with the conditioner and itu2019s such a great combo! Not only does it smell amazing but my hair seems more full and thicker as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this product smells, the way it leaves my hair is amazing! I absolutely enjoy this scent- the travel friendly bottles work so great and are so easy to throw in my travel bag! I would highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product I used the small travel size bottle and it took just that to notice a huge change in my hair I use to suffer a lot from hair loss and now my hair is doing much much better I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent to this! I feel like I had a spa like experience using this. I didnu2019t notice any major changes to my hair but I did really enjoy using it. I feel like with continued use you would see changes in your hair because the ingredients look great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary of Influenster and Vegamour in exchange for my honest review. Honestly, im not incredibly impressed with this shampoo, mainly due to the face that the scent gives me an instant headache and lingers for days. Although it does cleanse the hair effectively and makes it appear a bit fuller after just one use due to the addition of panthenol in the ingredient list, I canu2019t attest to the effectiveness as far as hair growth goes simply because i cannot bear the strong fragrance (maybe the bergamot?) to use it on a regular basis. Iu2019m not usually sensitive to fragrance in beauty products, i actually lean more towards those that contain fragrance because i enjoy the sensorial experience, but this is a very natural incense-like scent thatu2019s just different. Itu2019s a shame because iu2019m trying to grow out my shoulder length impulse chopped hair and was really hoping to give this a run for itu2019s money. If you can bear the smell, the ingredients do sound quite promising and the fact that itu2019s vegan is a total plus! I personally will not be purchasing the full size, but donu2019t let my opinion deter you! Give it a whiff and if the scent profile appeals to you, by all means, go for it! Or should i sayu2026 GRO for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the travel size GRO Revitalizing Shampoo for Thinning Hair & Hair Wellness from Vegamour. I tried this along with the matching conditioner. I can't say yet if it does help with hair growth as that would take several months of use before seeing a difference, but I am hoping the claims are promising as I have thin and thinning hair. The shampoo lathers well and has a light, refreshing scent containing citrus oils naturally. It rinses clean and my hair looks nice. I love that this is vegan and am excited about the Karmatin being not just an alternative to Keratin, but it says it is even better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So far, I have really enjoyed this shampoo.  I canu2019t really speak to the u201cgrowthu201d aspect of it, as I only got the small size to try, and it only was enough for about 3-4 washes.  I really liked the smell, kind of a light citrus, and smells nice all day.  It made my hair feel soft, looked shiny and felt great.  Recommend using with the conditioner.  Would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It has a nice citrus scent and the lather was great too so if you like clarifying shampoos then this might work for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

I was gifted a travel size version for testing so I canu2019t evaluate the long term effects on hair growth which can take from 3-6 months, but overall itu2019s a nice gentle shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: This Dry Shampoo is THAT good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary, but all opinions are my own. I normally don't purchase dry shampoos because they often leave my hair feeling weighed down and caused build up. This dry shampoo on the other hand left my hair feeling really good; anytime I was in between washes I would use this dry shampoo and it would revive my hair a bit! I am also a fan of the light orange/citrus scent; it is perfect scent to pick me up in the morning! I have pretty thick hair so I'm not sure if it helps for people with thinning hair, but it definitely helped my hair last a little longer in between washes without it feeling dirty or without a lot of build up. Would definitely buy this dry shampoo again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo smells like grapefruit heaven. It leaves my hair voluminous and healthy. Also,you don't have to have thinning hair to use this and enjoy all of it's benefits. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

I donu2019t know how well it works to grow my hair longer I think Iu2019d have to use it for a few months to see that kind of difference but itu2019s still a really great shampoo with great ingredients and smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample and in return for my honest opinion on it.  A clean ingredient shampoo is a must! Add a beautiful scent is a plus, throw in a wonderful lathering experience is amazing now waking up the next day and having your hair feel soft, silky and smelling wonderful?! I mean Iu2019m here for it and sign me up ASAP! Well this Vegamour shampoo did not disappoint and definitely delivered!! I consider myself a shampoo/conditioner/ all hair products - aholic! I will buy them and test them all out. I am so glad I received this gem to add to my collection. I will absolutely be purchasing it and it will be a staple in my hair care routine. 10/10 I definitely recommend it to try out.  Clean ingredients and vegan friendly. Simply amazing. For reference I have very long (waist length) wavy hair. I also live in a very hot, humid/ tropical climate and my hair smelled amazing for days and remained frizz free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Amazing product! Smells so good and keeps the frizz away! Great product. Makes hair smooth and manageable! like design of bottle .

reviews.review_text: All in all this product is nice but wonu2019t be for everyone. If you have sensitive skin, maybe sit this one out or use it sparingly.  I was able to make it work for me by viewing this as a treatment wash after cleansing and not depending on this product as an actual shampoo. I also highly encourage you to pair this with a very nourishing conditioner to avoid tangles or frizz, especially for those with fine/thin/brittle hair types.  It smells nice, adds shine, and it seems promising when used with their system. Iu2019m excited to see if any new hair growth comes in with this. So far, I think their serum is helping me the most.

reviews.review_title: Switched from Caviar to this - Love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I switched from using Caviar shampoo. I was getting horrible acne along my forehead and hair line. Ever since I switched to this, I've been so happy. No more greasiness or acne along my hairlines. Doesn't seem to have any acne causing ingredients.  Also, it does actually help with hair growth. I have an issue with pulling my hair out and this has definitely helped my hair look healthier. When I style my hair, my hair definitely looks fuller than when I didn't use this shampoo. But when I dont style, my hair is pretty flat. Maybe if this had a volumizer that would be perfect. But overall this is a great product and I plan on using this long term..   Lastly to add, this product doesnt seem to give scalp build up like other shampoos. I used to get really dry dandruff flakes on my scalp and this definitely helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo and conditioner. Itu2019s been a few months with using them and the serum and I feel like my hair is growing so much.. definitely been recommending to everyone with hair loss problems or concerns.

I tried them together 3 different times and every time my roots were heavy and oily and the bottom of my hair a frizzy mess. I even tried using the conditioner first (I have very thin hair that gets weighed down easily so sometimes this combo actually works better for me) but no, still felt like it was u201c3rd day hairu201d that I immediately had to put dry shampoo in it to make it not look like a dirty mess. reviews.review_title: Happy with the hair growth from using this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this directly through vegamour because they were having a 25% sale but I intend to replenish via Sephoras upcoming sale.  Iu2019ve been using vegamour for six months because my hair inexplicably dramatically slowed its growth and became very thin. I went to multiple doctors and had lots of tests done and thankfully, everything is fine, but we have no idea what is causing the hair issues. Out of desperation I tried this product. After two months I saw modest growth and a slow down of shedding. I paired the shampoo/conditioner with the serum. I ran out of serum a few months ago but continued to use the shampoo and still see the benefits and my hair had grown more the last six months than the entire last two years.   I pair the shampoo with a u201cscalpyu201d aka plastic tool that scratches your scalp and really makes it clean. (I got one from Amazon for about $6) My hair is soft and manageable after I use the shampoo. I also actually really like the smell.  Overall, im personally very happy with vegamour products because they seem to be working for me and they leave my hair cleaner and softer than before.   After some research it appears the serum is basically a concentrated form of caffeine and that the ordinarys hair serum, which is a fraction of the cost, is also caffeine so Iu2019m considering just using that serum instead of paying a lot more for vegamours.   Nevertheless I plan to continue using the shampoo/conditioner because at the very least it leaves my hair very clean, soft and manageable but also does actually seem to help with growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this full sized expensive product with my own money after receiving a sample. I liked the way it made my hair look/feel right before a mask and a blow out because before using my hair was looking/feeling thin. Havenu2019t seen results yet, will update soon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t buy this shampoo on Sephora but on its official website (20%off and I paid shipping $5) . I also think this product is best paired with the GRO conditioner to achieve that silky smooth result.
