Itu2019s been a little over a month and am happy so far. I love the way it smells and how my hair feels clean. Iu2019m excited to see the progress with continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has turned into one of my favorite shampoos! I was a little nervous at the beginning because I color my hair and I wasnu2019t sure if it would make it brassy. The smell is so nice, not too strong and doesnu2019t stick to your hair when it dry. I hate overpowering smells of shampoos. My hair feels clean but not dry which is amazing and it hasnu2019t made my color brassy at all. Besides my mind being blown about that itu2019s helped with the crazy amount of shedding I was dealing with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had oily hair with a dry scalp before using this. The only shampoos that have felt like they were cleaning my hair and helping the itchy scalp were medicated shampoos until this guy! My hair used to be super oily the next day, but with this I can go 2-3 days between washes. The biggest thing that sold me was that it stopped my itchy scalp!!! I donu2019t think I will ever use another shampoo, I love how clean my hair feels and how it has helped my scalp. Iu2019ve been using it for about a year (ordered from their site directly). Iu2019m excited Sephora has it since now I will be getting Beaty points with my purchases. I also noticed my hair falls out less, and my hair looks thicker. It does not over dry your hair like a lot of shampoos but I only use it on my scalp and tend to leave it on for about 5 minutes before washing it off. The price is a bit high but I really think itu2019s worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this shampoo and conditioner before it was on Sephora and let me tell you, itu2019s the best! Iu2019ve been using it for almost 8 months now; Iu2019ve seen a huge difference in my hair itu2019s healthy,soft,shiny, and grow faster then before. Plus it smells so good!

reviews.review_title: Smells so Good; Makes Hair so Soft; Too Pricey.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only received a sample and I have 22 hair with extensions, so I had to mix it with my Olaplex No. 4 & 5, but wowww. I went and mowed tons of grass in 92u00b0F heat with 90% Humidity for 6 hours and my hair smelled amazing the whole time. if the ticket wasn't so high, I'd buy the full versions, just for the scent & how soft it made my hair. It's double the price of Olaplex (which I find a ridiculous price) so I don't think I can stomach the cost when I already sell my soul to Olaplex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this, but it doesn't do anything different than other shampoos. Nice scent, but it doesn't linger. I also got the conditioner.  Not impressed. Not worth the exorbitant price.
Love this product! The scent is divine. Iu2019ve struggled with thinning hair for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not receive this product as a free sample for my honest review. I paid for the shampoo. I am still paying for the shampoo. My hair feels dry and weirdly coated The smell, which was pleasant in the bottle, is overpowering once on. Everywhere my hair touches, itches. I had to put it up just so I would not feel it anymore. My neck and back is still itching. My hair feels so fragile that I am almost afraid to touch it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg.  This is my thin hairu2019s savior. Iu2019ve been using this for a few weeks, 3x a week. Itu2019s made a significant difference in the volume of my hair. I feel in its growth, itu2019s also boosted the volume of my hair. With using it so consistently, I feel itu2019s been helpful to prompt hair growth. The scent is divine also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo smells great! After continued use, my hair is softer, thicker and overall more healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has become one of my favorite shampoos I have ever used. I bleach and flat iron my hair. My hair needs help with shine, breakage and frizz. This shampoo smells so amazing. After consistently using I notice no breakage and my hair shines. This shampoo will defiantly be in my hair care routine. I have already recommended this shampoo to all my friends. I received this product from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become one of my favorite shampoos I have ever used. I have color treated hair and need help with shine, frizziness and breakage. This shampoo smells a bit like grapefruit and has a light peachy color, lathers easily and does not cause any bacne (trust me some of other shampoos on the market do) After a consistent use my hair has regained shine, strength and no breakage. I definitely will be buying this shampoo again as it does what is promised and you cannot beat clear ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this complimentary full sized product from influenster.  This smells nice and repaired the texture of my hair within 3 uses.  So far, I haven't grown any more hair tho.  Still using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all . This Shampoo smells ammmmmazing ! Like orange juice fresh squeeze and it last ! I can literal smell it through out the say ! It leaves my hair feeling amazing and finger ready . My hair looks and feels so much Healthier since ai started using it . Great product ! My hair thanks you !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free through Influenster. The product gets a very nice sudsy feeling. Helps the head feel clean but not too over drying like most other products.

reviews.review_title: Heavily scented and Not great for curls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Eh, so so. I have loosely curly hair. I didnu2019t find that this did anything for my curls. In fact they seemed a little fluffier and less defined than usual which is saying a lot because I donu2019t do a much for them besides use curly hair conditioner. Also, I honestly felt like more of my hair fell out than when I didnu2019t use it. The scent was VERY strong. It would stay in my hair at least week without washing - yes I only wash my hair once a week. Maybe that strong of fragrance is good for some but I found it awful since heavy fragrance tends to give me a headache. I got this for free and will definitely not be re-purchasing. It still did clean my hair though, so it gets more than 1 star.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this system (shampoo, conditioner, serum, and vitamins) for a little over a month.  Unfortunately I have seen absolutely no results in the hair thinning department. (My before and after pics are the same. I wish I was allowed to wait 3 months before reviewing....) I do like this shampoo and will continue to use it hoping for results by the 90 day mark.  It smells lovely and leaves my hair and scalp feeling clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't addressing any thinning concerns, but looking for a vegan and green option for haircare. I could tell a difference in softness after just one use. The smell isn't the best, but it's still nice, and subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this is one of the greatest shampoos I have ever used. I used to be very anti-shampoo, going months between washes and sticking to cleansing conditioners. However, this stuff changed the game for me. First of all, IT SMELLS SO GOOD. Like ruby grapefruit candy and it makes my hair smell like that all day. Second of all, I noticed way less breakage and frizz. It actually made my hair grow faster. I will buy this product again and again. I canu2019t recommend it more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used in combination with the conditioner, gummies and hair foam, for 3 weeks exclusively, I noticed a improvement in my hair health. The scent is pleasing too, and I really like that it is a vegan product. Very satisfied!!

reviews.review_title: More Volume and Sweet Smelling Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed that my black hair seemed darker and more vibrant after each wash. My hair also was very fluffy and had more volume. The shampoo smelled so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free to test and provide a review. I figured it wouldnu2019t do too much but still took a before (on right) and after (on left) picture. I was wrong about it not doing much! Over the years, Ive experienced some hair loss along my hairline from wearing a tight low bun in the military. Fortunately, itu2019s starting to grow back now! The before and after pictures are about 4 weeks apart after using the gummies, serum, shampoo and conditioner daily. My hair has started to fill back in and Iu2019m so excited! The shampoo and conditioner smell nice too. Itu2019s not an overpowering smell but enough to give my hair a nice scent throughout the day. I just reordered the shampoo and conditioner again. I definitely recommend giving this product a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wish I could say that I love this product because I love the smell of it and the matching conditioner. It reminds me of Smarties candy, and I love that it sticks with me. I like that it doesn't leave me with flakes, and my hair does seem a bit thicker. However, this isn't the best cleansing shampoo for me. There's one spot where I have more oil than others, and this shampoo doesn't quite seem to cut it, even if I use a lot. Sadly, I have to use another shampoo when I notice that greasy spot. If your hair isn't oily or is even dry, you might have better luck!

reviews.review_title: TRY IT, YOU'LL BE BLOWN AWAY!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW!!! That that's pretty much my first impression after my first use of The Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Haircare Line!! Very first thing I noticed is how fresh and clean smelling it was wasn't overwhelming and kept my hair brush for quite some time.  No I make sure to take photos of my hair before I started using it and throughout my use to gauge, their sayings of the growing hair is accurate or not. After my first w weeks of use of The Vegamour GRO Shampoo I started noticing my hair felt sillier and fuller, I also noticed the baby hairs along my hairline looked fuller than usual.  By the end of my supply I compared my hairline, and length and - WOAH!!!! I Was Blown Away!!!! Not only did this amazing product repair the damage in my haur- it actually grew my hair!!!! My very fine baby hair became fuller began growing along my face! The baby hairs at the back of my hair line filled in drastically.  My hair overall felt softer, smoother, and shinier than I had ever seen it before! I have to say that this is probably one of the best products on the market text my wife this to me I will forever be Vegamour! TRY IT, YOU'LL BE BLOWN AWAY!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells delicious like citrus fruits. The consistency is very normal comparatively. You definitely need to have er hair for it to suds up at all. It did a good job cleaning and clarifying my hair without stripping it. Felt amazing after rinsing. Directions say to rub it in your scalp for awhile to let the hair growing ingredients sink into your scalp. Overall I feel this shampoo is top notch and worth the high price point. Since it was only a one month supply I donu2019t see huge amounts of regrowth or length, but I definitely see less breakage. I am going to repurchase and keep using for sure.

reviews.review_title: Gonna love your hair after this shampoos
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smoothing shampoo, really makes your hair bright and shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this shampoo. My hair was so damaged and thinning. Now it's thick and healthy.  I 100% recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for over 3 weeks now in combination with other items (conditioner, serum and gummies) and have not noticed much of a difference. Maybe a little less fallout. I expect there will be a difference if I continue with all products for an extended period of time. I received these items complimentary for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this shampoo and the accompanying condition!  It feels ultra moisturizing and my hair always felt silly and soft.  I really didn't think I was getting new growth, but I'm starting to notice baby hairs popping up!  My only gripe is that I got pregnant while using this product and couldn't handle the scent after awhile. It reminds me of an orange lifesaver or sweet citrus candy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start with, the packaging is good. The squeeze tube seems to be a good combo with the smooth texture of the shampoo. The smell of the shampoo is sweet and fruity, just like candy. However, it is a mild fragrance and does not overwhelm. The shampoo is good and lather well on the hairs. However, it is a very gentle daily shampoo, making it a wrong choice for someone with an oily scalp (like me). It leaves the scalp oily and adds the buildup. I didn't see much of a difference in growth (that's what it is supposed to do). The only difference I noticed was my hairs are less frizzy. Overall, good shampoo, but looking at the price and the results wouldn't recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These products leave your hair smelling amazing & I typically hate scented products. (I buy unscented regularly.) I did have to use a bit more than the directions, because my hair is thicker or maybe because my head is big! I really liked how clean my scalp felt after shampooing. I tried it with & without their detox serum. My scalp & hair felt clean both ways, but it felt stripped clean with the serum. I recommend doing them both! It took a lot longer for me to need a wash than normal & I used little to no dry shampoo the whole time, because it does such a good job.   I got compliments on my hair when I used only the Vegamour products without my normal hair care routine. I wanted to see how my hair did without my normal routine, because my other products are enhancers for good hair.   However, I have thick hair & I didn't notice any more thickness, but I did notice more shedding which probably means it was stimulating new growth. I'm going to continue using it until it runs out to see if I notice. I've been using it for 5 weeks as of now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo has a pleasant smell and my hair has never felt thicker and softer! It is a little pricey but in my opinion its worth it if you have thin or damaged hair and want to see results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice shampoo. The smell is an orange scent which is pleasant and it has a nice lather. I do find that the suggested quarter size amount is not really enough to clean my whole scalp so I end up using a bit more. I have noticed when I use this shampoo I have less fallout in the shower and my actual hair strands feel thicker but I havenu2019t noticed any new hair growth. Iu2019ve only used it for a couple weeks so I will give it more time. Overall itu2019s a nice shampoo but a bit expensive for the amount you get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product complimentary. I donu2019t have thinning hair so I canu2019t speak on usage really and itu2019s a small bottle for someone with thick long hair. Smells delicious though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula had a light scent and a super thin consistency; it smelled sweet like sweettarts candy. I used this product for approximately three weeks and didn't notice any difference in the thickness of my hair. What I did notice is that it made my hair feel dirty, greasy and heavy. It never rinsed all the way out - no matter the amount I used on my hair.  I received this complimentary to test from Influenster. And while I'm grateful for the opportunity to try out a product I wouldn't have purchased myself, I won't be buying it again. I found absolutely no difference in my hair at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the smell and feel of this shampoo! It did help my hair feel and look thicker and more luxurious and hydrated! However, I have very sensitive scalp. After a month of using this shampoo, my scalp dried out and started flaking super bad! Its a great product, but just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing, if you like strong scented shampoo! A little goes a long way. It helped tone down my frizziness and made my hair more shiny. Overall a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have curly hair (3Bish?) with a scalp that can get oily easily. I work out 3 days a week and swim often, so I often cannot go without washing my hair. I use this shampoo with the conditioner, and they pair very well together. The shampoo by itself is wonderful. Overall, my hair is softer and when I use it, it doesnu2019t feel like it dries out my hair. My hair and scalp feel clean, and it effectively removes the grime of my workout without stripping it entirely. The scent is lovely as well. It smells of orange creamsicles! I have noticed while I used it, my scalp is more sensitive, but the hair that has been coming from my scalp is softer. I do use the hair oil as well, and eat the vitamin gummies. This could be the combination of all of them, but I think this is truly making a difference in my hair. I did receive this from Influenster to review for free, however, this review is my honest option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got this product from Influenster as a trial and could not even get through the full 3-4 weeks of using it, mostly because I couldnu2019t deal with the smell. It is VERY strong and it lingers. My boyfriend said he thought my hair smelled like dog shampoo after I used this. I also didnu2019t see much of a difference in terms of hair growth which itu2019s supposed to do, so for me, this product was a bust.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for 3-4 weeks with no visible difference. I have long, thin, fine, highlighted hair. The only thing I loved about this product was the scent. It smelled like fresh oranges. Other than that, the shampoo did nothing for my hair whatsoever..sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Has an amazing smell! The shampoo doesnu2019t seem to lather much and makes your hair feel dry in the shower, but after, my naturally oily hair is soft and shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This left my hair feeling really clean however I did have to use quite a bit. I personally didnt love the smell itu2019s very strong and a little weird smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Shampoo gave my hair the best clean of my life! My hair had more volume and my boyfriend gave me a ton of compliments! It was a little drying but my hair is prone to that, I have dry brittle and thin hair naturally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used the Vegamour shampoo in conjunction with Vegamour conditioner, Vegamour GRO serum, and the Vegamour gummies. The scent is citrus with tangerine really prominent. I tended to need more shampoo than normal to have clean feeling hair, but it has been very humid and been going through really intense stress. I have color treated hair that is also thin and very coarse in texture. I have been in the past a hair model to show straightening techniques and was label the example for bad hair. I lost more after the birth of my son followed by diagnosis of hypothyroidism and PCOS. I have noticed new growth on two of my worst areas. The biggest thing though was how soft and silky it has made my hair. I have never had it this soft before even with salon treatments. I can't stop touching my hair! My only nitpicky issue is the price point. My industry was wrecked by Covid, available jobs in my area have terrible wages for the long hours they require. I know my friends are dealing with similar issues. I can't quite justify the cost in my budget right now even cutting more from it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products in return for a honest review. I liked the citrusy fragrance and the packaging. However, I didnu2019t really noticed any difference with my hair regarding smoothness, frizzy, or hair growth.  I used it for almost a month. Also, the PH was too high for what I would prefer for my hair. When I tested it with PH strips, it came to a ph of 7. Also, I think itu2019s really pricey for an 8oz bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complementary from influenster. The smell is wonderful and not too crazy. My hair washes well and after a month of use I noticed my hair is slightly thicker. My hair has always been horribly thin so any improvement is appreciated. It is not a miracle product but for me it did work when used with the full range of products. I do like this shampoo but the cost is a little prohibitive for something that would only last so long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so grateful for receiving this product complimentary from Influenster. The scent is very bright and citrusy, but it fairly strong. I did notice more growth in my hair since beginning to use this product about a month ago. The lather is great and the effects are awesome. However, I did notice the progress stopped if I did. I also dont think I would spend this amount on the product on my own. My hair did not feel oily or matted after washijg, but did get oilier more quickly than it does with my traditional product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product along with the conditioner, scalp serum and gummies for 6 weeks. My hair is color treated (highlights). I have noticed a significant change- hair is a lot softer, decreased shedding, and more shine. Love the scent, and my hair doesn't feel dry after rinsing like it does with most shampoos. Overall my hair looks a lot healthier, bouncier and softer. Well it is pricier than other products on the market, I believe that given my results so far I will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a little over a month now. It makes my hair feel great, very soft. I have noticed that it seems longer and my baby hairs around my forehead (that seemed to be thinning bc I pull my hair back a lot ) look like theyu2019re growing in more. The scent is very strong but itu2019s a nice citrus scent. Itu2019s really expensive but worth it if you are having issues growing your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing, looks cute, and does a good job. Overall, it is hard to tell exactly how much it has done for my hair, but I do think it has gotten thicker and healthier since using. I do like this product and I believe I would purchase in the future. I took away one star because I canu2019t necessarily prove just how much it has done, but appearance wise my hair looks and feels fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, this shampoo smells great. Second, you can feel the cleanse it does to the scalp. Directions say to massage it in & when you rinse you can feel the difference in the texture of the hair. I started this after I dyed & cut my hair so I can really tell if it made a difference & I feel like it did!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t notice much of a change! The instructions included a lengthy scalp massage, after which I had a large handful of hairs come outu2014 not ideal when you already have thinning hair! Smell was pretty good but overall didnu2019t deliver what was promised

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this shampoo approximately 4-5x/week for the past month or so.  Wasnu2019t a fan of the smell at first (very fruity) but will say that it has grown on me. My scalp gets a bit dry and itchy, but I have not noticed those symptoms while using this shampoo.   Iu2019ve been using this together with the conditioner, hair serum and gummies - my hair definitely looks thicker/voluminous.  Will definitely purchase another once my current supply is up and add to my usual shampoo rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a month and I'm more than impressed. I have always had dry scalp problems, seasonal flaking, etc. It's gone! My hair feels so soft and it's thicker looking. The shampoo has a great lather and smells so yummy.

reviews.review_title: On the fence with this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to trying this product but to be honest, I'm not sure I saw much of a difference in my hair.  I have long hair so no real concerns with growth but it's fine and I tend to have days where I have so much come out when I wash my hair, I wonder what the heck is going on. This product didn't do anything to solve that.  The other thing about this product is the scent was off-putting.  I don't love it and it definitely makes me want to use it less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like this product. The smell is very overwhelming at first, but I eventually grew to like it. However this shampoo made my hair feel so rough and knotty. Combing my hair was a nightmare and i would have to RIP chunks of my hair out it was that bad. I had to switch back to my regular shampoo after a few weeks, I couldnt take it anymore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a #VoxBox on Influenster. The smell is a bit much but tolerable. I was pleasantly surprised that it cleaned so well! Usually vegan products leave my hair weighed down and greasy. This product cleans great! My hair dresser said she noticed regrowth when I have my appt so it must work! Itu2019s a very good product just not something I can afford at this time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Would I recommend this product? Yes I would! It smells so good (kind of like sour patch kids) and keeps my hair nice and moisturized! That being said Iu2019m giving it a four star rating because I have trouble with moisturizing products. After about a month of using this it my scalp started to become greasy fast? Other than that this product helped restore my damaged hair!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product does a good job at filling in the thinning spots however as soon as you use another shampoo it takes this out and kind of loses the effect. Definitely worth trying though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is good if you have frizzy hair. I live in a warm, humid climate and I can tell a difference in the amount of frizz my hair has after using this product. I am not sure that it helps with thinning hair as I have pretty thick hair to begin with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. I have frizzy curly hair, and being a sulfate free shampoo this helped a lot in toning down the frizz. I also used their hair gummies and conditioner for a month, and have noticed a huge reduction in hairfall when showering or detangling hair. Will recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Love it !!! Its the best product.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Waoo is the best product of this type that I have used, it is incredible and the truth is that if it works apart, its smell is incredible and the change in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice shampoo! I loved the smell, and it didnu2019t make my hair feel stripped or weighed down- just balanced! I havenu2019t noticed much in the way of growth yet, but to be fair I donu2019t wash my hair that often. Overall a really good shampoo option- and the bottle has a ton of product in it! I tried this for free but I would continue to use it in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good shampoo. I like the smell of it. It could use a bit more of a lather texture to it. I would recommend a deeper cleaning shampoo with it every once in a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to review. I just had a baby in December and started losing my hair a couple months ago. My hair became extremely thin and I wasnu2019t seeing any new hair growth at all until I tried this shampoo! I now have new hair growth all over my head. The smell of this shampoo is amazing. I would give it five stars but I have noticed that my hair is very oily one day after washing it when I can normally go a day or two and be completely fine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't be hapier with this. ITS EVERYTHING IT SAYS IT IS. my hair feels way ligther than other shampoo & also IT makes my hair feel crean for more time (I was washing my hair every other day and now it's every 3 days with no problem) AND THE SMELL. OMG THE SMELS LIKE HEAVEN

reviews.review_title: Great Concept, Just Not For Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that the GRO Revitalizing Shampoo for Thinning Hair for created for a specific problem that many women suffer with and I really like the scent.   However, my kinky 4c did not love it.  I felt like it was too mild for my hair type and didn't thoroughly clean my hair.   After using the shampoo my hair felt like it still had residue on it.  I definitely didn't see any difference in the thin appearance of my hair.   It's not a shampoo that I would use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an all around good shampoo! It leaves your hair smelling amazingggg - sometimes Iu2019ll take my hair down from a bun and the scent just washes over me. Itu2019s awesome actually. It leaves my hair feeling soft and refreshed. Frizz level hasnu2019t really been affected at all (I live in a super humid climateu2026 guess it canu2019t be helped!) and you do have to use a little extra to make your hair feel clean. The lather is okay, not great, so it can be a bit difficult if you donu2019t wash your hair everyday. I havenu2019t noticed any additional hair growth or volume, but Iu2019ve only been using it for a little over a month - the site does say it takes a few months to really see results - so Iu2019ll keep using! Even thought I havenu2019t seen results yet, Iu2019d recommend giving it a go. At the very least, itu2019s a good, yummy smelling shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is long, wavy, and color treated. I've also been dealing with split ends and frizz for all my life, which only a hair straightener can take. Was this shampoo the holy grail that turned my hair into something a Disney Princess would salivate over? No. But it definitely helped! And I would recommend it, along with the conditioner, serum, and gummy vitamins that are part of the Vegamour brand!   After using all the products together for a month my hair is definitely stronger and the split ends have tempered down a bit. It also left my hair feeling silky after the wash, although the frizz will have to be battled with another product. I only wash my hair 1-2 times per week and am excited to continue to use these products for the next month or so to see if things improve even further!   The shampoo has a great smell. And while scent is very personal, it reminded me of tangy strawberries. Light, refreshing, and NOT overpowering which is key. It also didn't linger too long on the hair so I didnt have to worry about how the scent would mix with my other perfumes.   The consistency was creamy and lathers like a dream! It also did not dull my color treated hair, which is awesome.  I would definitely recommend trying this out, although cannot speak to whether it works as a stand alone or you need the conditioner, serum, and vitamins as well. Only thing missing for me was the frizz control or I would have given it 5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this shampoo for the last 4 weeks and I liked it! The smell is nice (very sweet) but it didn't overwhelm me after drying my hair. I wish the texture had more lather, but overall easy to apply. I don't think my hair has grown but it seems healthier than before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this shampoo to try from Influenster. I have been using this for 3 1/2 weeks and I think there is potential with this line. The shampoo does get your hair very clean and you donu2019t need a lot of product. The smell is amazing. You will smell it through out the whole following day. If there was a different shampoo for a different concern from this brand with the same smell I would definitely buy it. I do see some growth for only using it the 3 1/2 weeks and I will post a photo. I also did have a trim scheduled. I would recommend this to someone with this specific concern.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this shampoo!  I really like what Vegamour stands for and how their products are made.  The GRO shampoo smells amazing and also provides a good lather without any harsh or chemicals or other components that arenu2019t necessary.  My hair is always smelling so delicious and looks shiny after washing with this shampoo and using the conditioner.  Love it!

reviews.review_title: Canu2019t wait for long term results!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamouru2019s GRO Revitalizing Shampoo works great! It makes my hair smell good, it cleanses my scalp efficiently while not drying out my hair, and lathers well! With this and the other two GRO Revitalizing products, I have yet to see a huge difference as I wash my hair once a week, but altogether my hair is softer! I also feel my hair is thicker in areas it used to be thin at, though I could just be seeing things. Overall I recommend this shampoo and I canu2019t wait to see the long term results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I used this for a month, 2-3 times a week (using my usual hairwashing schedule). I would say this product is okay. I saw some temporary volume when using this shampoo, but did need to use a detox shampoo once a week as this product is very mild (which I prefer a mild daily shampoo and a more stripping detox shampoo when needed when I use more hair products that cause buildup) Per the directions, you need to use for 3 months to see results, but in the one month I used it, I didn't hate it, I also didn't love it either. I need hydration. I have thin hair (not to be confused with thinning hair). It doesn't add hydration at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I really like this shampoo, conditioner and serum. Prior to using this system I had a ton of hair fallout. I noticed a difference in hair fallout after the first use. My hair also feels like u201cadultu201d hair. This system gives my hair texture and helps hold style throughout the day. I really enjoyed using it but not sure if I can commit to the price tag on each product needed for success. If they have a sample starter kit I would recommend to make sure it works for you before committing to the price tag. I received these products complementary from Influenster in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a decent shampoo but, I'm not personally a bit fan. I used it for a month and never saw much enhanced growth from my typical growth. It also made me wash my hair more often as my hair got oily faster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved my product thanks to Influenster and Vegamour in exchange for my honest review.  If this company, or any, decides to make a regular shampoo that smells like this, I would consider buy it. It smells amazing, and the scent lasts all day! Its function to stimulate growth however, is lacking. My hair length stagnated and barely grew 3mm in the 30 days. I simply followed instructions of using a small amount, and the bottle is lasting pretty long, and I have lots of product left. I will continue to use it until it runs out, but would not considered purchasing for its intent in the future.

reviews.review_title: My new favorite hair care product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love this new product. For years, I have been using the same salon brand shampoo and conditioner for wavy hair. I was a but skeptical to try something new. I received this product complimentary, to try for free. The product was thick, smelled great and had easy application. The results left my hair not frizzy, smooth, and had great volume and texture without even adding any other hair products (mousse, gel, styling creams). I was blown away by this product on the first use. I will definitely buy this and incorporate into my beauty routine. I'll also be sure to recommend to others. I cant, however, say I saw any results on hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this shampoo every 2-3 days for about three weeks. I notice that my hair is less frizzy now. I really love the scent of the shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a little over three weeks. I have noticed a different. I feel like my hair feels thicker and less frizzy. I have also noticed that it have grown a little since I started using. The smell isnu2019t the best in my opinion but the product is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this shampoo every 2-3 days when I wash my hair for 4 weeks now. The smell is a sweet, herbal kind of smell. It's not my favorite, but it certainly isn't bad. The product itself is thin, so it does squeeze from the bottle quite easily.  My hair did have that squeaky clean feeling after use - including washing my hair after a massage where I had an unusual amount of lotion in my hair.  For a shampoo, I think it works very well. I don't know that I've noticed much difference in terms of thickness, but I do feel like I've been losing less hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of hair, so thinning isnu2019t a problem, but I did notice my hair felt thicker after using this shampoo for a while. The smell is so familiar, but I canu2019t think of what it reminds me of u2014 Juicy Fruit gum? Iu2019ve also noticed that I donu2019t end up with as much hair coming out during washes. Iu2019ve really enjoyed using this shampoo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked using this shampoo. It has a great smell. I would recommend it with the conditioner as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this shampoo for 6 weeks now. I would say that I do notice less hair in my drain since using this shampoo. I did like the scent at first but after smelling the scent all day it gave me a headache. I was impressed on how long the scent lasted. I would recommend if you do like the scent of it. The bottle has lasted longer than I thought.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to review and I'm pretty happy with the results as far as revitalizing my hair.  I already have thick and long hair so no help needed in that department. I find the scent somewhat citrusy, and my hair is less frizzy. I've had similar results with less expensive shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture of the product. There is a nice scent to It just not my personal preference. Iu2019ve been using It for about 1 month and I will be sticking with It till the bottles done so I can really see if It makes a lasting impression. I have curly hair so I might prefer something for curl hydration over this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this shampoo, the conditioner, and the vitamins and hair serum from Influenster for free as a way to try try it in exchange for an honest review. This shampoo has a gel-like consistently and smells amazing. My hair feels clean every time I use it but Iu2019m not sure it has helped for thinning hair. However, it doesnu2019t foam up much, so if that is something you like in a shampoo, maybe look to other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really have been enjoying this shampoo! I have been using it for a few weeks now, about twice a week. My hair tends to be on the dry side with a lot of frizz. With this product, I have noticed significantly less frizz!!! Another huge bonus is the scent!!! It lasts in your hair for HOURS! Really recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product not only works well but smells amazing. I was a little bit hesitant because my hair can get greasy but this product worked amazingly in conjunction with the other products. I will definitely be using this product for my hair as it works so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing and it helped moisturize my hair. It smelled like perfume or scented soaps with a fruity scent. My hair looked more moisturized and healthy after using this product. I love that this product is also vegan and cruelty free because it means that no animals were harmed while making this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product, to sample, from influenster. Unfortunately, it is not a product I really need. I have overly thick hair already. But there are some major positive points to this line, imo.  1) Vegan  2) Cruelty free 3) and free of all harmful chemicals.   I love the scent. Almost like tangerine. I did not notice much change in growth, per se, but what I DID notice was this:  *the multitude of hairs that I was shedding on a daily basis, drastically dropped.  *my hair was so extremely soft AND shiny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. Honestly I saw no difference in my hair after using this. My hair is already very fine and partially thinning despite being young. My hair felt too dry and if anything looked worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I have dyed hair and was really worried it would make my hair feel like lead. Iu2019ve had really bad experiences with shampoo that strip my hair like crazy. This shampoo has a really light, lux scent & is super moisturizing. I can go about 72 hours without having to wash my hair which is super great since I want my color to stay on my hair.

reviews.review_title: Not the right fit for my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo did an okay job on my long, thick, coarse hair.  I usually have an oily scalp and dry mids to ends, and it left my hair feeling squeaky clean (as in stripped of oils) after rinsing. Once dry, my hair was still somewhat frizzy around the midsection and ends. Unfortunately, my hair simply isn't the right fit for this product. In addition to the dryness, I wasn't a fan of the scent.  I imagined for the price it would smell a bit more luxurious instead of citrusy like grapefruit.  I haven't noticed any difference in thickness or fullness unless you count the dry frizz, and I don't think my hair grew any faster than normal. I love the packing because the tube is extra soft which made it easy to grip and deposit product with wet hands, but I also have some weakness in my hand which makes it difficult to squeeze hard, so this was helpful.  I imagine it would be great for anyone with arthritis.  With all that being said, for me personally, the price is too steep for frequent/daily use, and I'm not sure the results blew me away to warrant the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was eager to try this, although I've only used this a few weeks I am noticing a slight difference in my thinning hair. This has a slight fruity smell but not overwhelming. I love the blush pink packaging, my only issue is the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product and was so hopeful. Unfortunately, it did not do what it claimed to do. Using it left my hair weighed down and dry and also oily at the same time...very odd. It did smell good and lathered nicely.

reviews.review_title: Smells nice but hair health happens inside
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this shampoo for free from influenster in exchange for an honest review. I happen to work in the health and wellness field for a Doctor Who runs a program for hair regrowth for people with thyroid disorders. I can tell you that there is no topical product that will change the way things are on the inside. You can hydrate your hair and change the appearance of a temporary Lee but real change has to come from your body, not from a u201cdetergentu201d that you suds and rinse out. That being said the product smells amazing and feels a little bit thick like honey and can take a bit longer than normal shampoos to rinse. I wasnu2019t particularly impressed with it but my husband who also has long hair loves it so much that he declared he would continue buying it until I showed him the price tag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo! Ames my hair and scalp feel clean and moisturized. The only thing is I wish it came in a bigger size. I have long thick black hair so I go through a lot of shampoo. Overall itu2019s a great product and worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice product. Texture is thick, smells amazing, kinda fruity. Just a little goes a long way. Left my hair so smooth after the first time I used it. I noticed my baby hair growing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo has a simple lather. Along with the conditioner it left my hair feeling soft. I have curly hair and I was impressed, after my hair dried my curls were soft, full and had a nice shine. As far as the scent its a very light scent that does not linger. After a couple of uses I do feel like my hair looks and feels healthy and my hair is thicker. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells nice and lathers well.  It gave my hair a ton of volume but left it feeling dry and damaged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to review. My hair is cut short in a pixie cut. It took about 4 weeks before I noticed any change. My hair is now softer and more manageable. I noticed a small amount of hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using GRO Revitalizing Shampoo for a little over a month now and it has become a part of my daily routine-I absolutely LOVE this product. The shampoo is thick and lathers up nicely-you only need a small amount and it does not leave my hair feeling greasy. It leaves my hair feeling so soft and clean and it smells amazing. I  highly recommend this shampoo. I also love the bottle :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have so much to say about these Vegamour  products but I am gonna try to keep it short. First of all itu2019s incredibly luxurious feeling sudsing up with this shampoo and not only does it smell fantastic but it cleans my incredibly naturally greasy hair so good. And the conditioner smells the same but even better and much to my amazement did an incredible job of conditioning my incredibly long stringy hair. I thought the directions on the conditioner were crazy telling me to apply to my scalp and massage in cause again I have really naturally greasy hair but I did it anyway expecting to have to rewash the next day instead of every 48 hours like I usually do but I was pleasantly surprised that not only did it not make me an instant greaseball but I could have gone longer than 48 hours without rewashing if I wanted to.  I have very thin hair that with age (I am almost 39) has started to thin out and let me tell you thinning out with already thin hair is incredibly depressing. I have tried so many other hair care products claiming to help but nothing has so you can imagine how shocked I was that in one month of using the Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo, GRO Revitalizing Conditioner, GRO Hair Serum and eating the GRO Biotin Gummies I have noticed a HUGE difference, not only does my hair no longer look stringy and unhealthy but itu2019s incredibly obvious that it is more full. I am excited to see what continued use is gonna bring cause with what I am seeing in only one month I know itu2019s gonna be amazing. I regret so badly not taking before pics but like I said I have tried so many products claiming to boost growth and volume and never saw it so my expectations were not there. However I am taking pics now to show one month in and will take again after 3 months :).  So to sum it upu2026 IT WORKS AND I LOVE MY HAIR NOW!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This didnu2019t exactly thicken my hair, but it smells amazing and is color safe. If you are looking for a bomb product...look no further but know that it doesnu2019t make you grow more hair or anything like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good Product, not so much packaging. The shampoo seems good. I had a problem with the package. I torr the seal off the opening, like always. It must have left a film over the hole, because I couldn't seem to get the product to come out. I finally stuck something in the hole, and opened it up. It came out much more freely after doing this. After my shower, I took the shampoo, as well as the conditioner, and placed them on my dresser in my bedroom, as I didn't want my children to waste them. I noticed the next day that the shampoo had somehow leaked out of the cap, and ran all down my dresser. This is the reason for my 3 stars.  The shampoo itself is good, the packaging needs improvement.

Loved this shampoo, the scent is wonderful and lasted almost until my next wash day. The formula was a little strong for my hair so I alternated it with a mild shampoo but I noticed quite a bit of growth in only a few weeks of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for almost a month now and I absolutely love this shampoo! I have chemically treated hair and using this in conjunction with the conditioner, my hair is soft, supple and shiny. I have noticed I have minimal fallout now which I very much appreciate. The smell is quite strong but not unpleasant in my opinion. I highly recommend this and will definitely purchase when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. Iu2019ve been using this for a few weeks, and I feel that my hair is noticeably softer and more manageable. I donu2019t notice much difference in terms of hydration, but my hair does appear smoother, and healthier. It smells great which is a big bonus! The packaging is also super cute. I will buy again.

reviews.review_title: Great shampoo for volume and softness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most luxurious shampoos I have ever used. My hair isnu2019t thinning and I actually have pretty thick hair but I love what it did to the roots of my hair. Instead of my hair falling flat it gave it super nice volume at the roots and my hair truly has never felt softer. I love that it is vegan and doesnu2019t have sulfates either. Definitely use it with the conditioner as well. Definitely worth the price and I noticed results even after the first wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve really liked using this shampoo along with the conditioner. Iu2019ve always had very thick dense hair, so I am not a good judge for that aspect, but otherwise I like it a lot. The packaging is nice and doesnu2019t slip out of your hands in the shower, I like the texture of the product and it distributes nicely. My hair feels nice, soft and clean. Overall, my absolute favorite thing is the smell. Itu2019s very satsuma and I wish I had a body spray of it, itu2019s so nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this product to test for free in exchange for my honest review. I absolutely love this shampoo. First it smells amazing and the smell lasts all day. I have been using this for about three weeks now. My hair feels cleaner and is more manageable which is a challenge because I have hard water. As this is the first step in the process for the vegamour system. It is well worth it to not only get the product but get the whole system. I highly recommend this and I will be continuing to buy their products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. I've tried it for 3 weeks now and my hair feels softer and healthier than before. It hasn't, however, helped with loss of hair. This has a citrus smell which I love and it lasts at least 2 days. This product is in the pricier side so it is something to keep in mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I could feel the difference everytime I washed my hair. I liked how my hair felt clean and light, but not super dry. I cannot say for sure, if this product aided in restoring my hair, but I can say that I saw less breakage during use. The only drawback in my opinion, is the lack of an aroma.A diamond

reviews.review_title: This is a must try..You will not be disappointed.!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this product. Only bad thing I can say is I havent been able to tell if my hair has truly gotten thicker. Now with that said... I've never been happier with any hair product as I am with my Vegamour shampoo. My hair is so solf and for the first time since I was a teenager when I began bleaching my hair, have I been able to say my hair looks and feels healthy. I'm certain with more use it will the best hair I've ever rocked. And the smell is quite pleasing to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo smells like.. oranges. Love the smell. My hair is thick and long and so far this shampoo leaves it slick. The only thing I did not like was that you have to use conditioner because it leaves it stiff and dry. I did use the conditioner that goes with it and I do enjoy the smell, texture. Have not had any side effects (dandruff). I have noticed that my hair does not fall out as much.I do recommend this product just make did you get the conditioner with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I tried the product a couple of times, Iu2019m natural so this was about 2 weeks. Honestly I stopped using it because it made my 3C/4A hair very dry. In addition, while washing and conditioning there was no detangling agent. However, I do love the smell of the product. Overal just not that best for black natural hair.

reviews.review_title: Truly best shampoo Iu2019ve ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for over a month and my hair growth is ridiculous. Iu2019m so shocked and how thick and healthier my hair feels compared to before I used this product. I went from bleached blonde Asian to dyed back to dark. So you better believe my hair had crazy damage. This shampoo helped my hair with the texture of feeling healthier as well as giving my strands the nutrients it definitely needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this shampoo in a voxbox campaign from influenster. It smells incredible at first, sweet and citrusy but I have to admit I did tire of the smell after using it for a few weeks. It is very strong! The shampoo feels like honey and lathers well. A little seems to go a long way. It did make my hair softer and shinier. I actually had someone comment on it. However, I found that when I used the shampoo and conditioner together my hair would get a bit oily at the roots. Also I noticed it was frizzier thatu2019s normal. I started using the shampoo with a different conditioner or the conditioner with a different shampoo and that helped. My hair is fairly thick to begin with, so I think someone with thinner hair would benefit more from this product. I donu2019t think I would recommend it to anyone with oily hair. Iu2019m glad I got to try it. Overall I think itu2019s a nice product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly my holy grail shampoo itu2019s everything! Itu2019s helped me so much with my flaky and inflamed scalp! My scalp has calmed down so much since Iu2019ve bought it and I honestly recommend the entire brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this shampoo from influenster to test and let me tell you I am really impressed, my hair isn't really thinning but I have noticed a lot of new growth. My hair is super soft and shiny, which is impressive considering my hair is fairly course 3a/3b curls. I'm very picky about my shampoo and this meets every one of my qualifications and it smells so good. I definitely recommend vegamour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster to give my honest opinion.  Iu2019ll start by saying it smells amazing !!  I have curly hair but thin hair .. i shed a lot !! I only wash my hair maybe twice a week so i feel like i may have to wait until Iu2019m completely done with product to give a full review .. but as of now i did notice less shedding when in shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and I have been using the product for more than 3 weeks, I have noticed my hair silkier and shinier, the smell is also delicious, I hope to use it longer to observe the growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in an influenster Vox Box and and I've consistently used it every day since I have received it. it makes my hair look Fuller, it looks healthier,does not look stringing or greasy by the end of the day and definitely has more body. I highly recommend this product. You only need a small amount and it lathers great. The price is a little steep for me and shampoo but I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *received free from Influenster*  I didnu2019t notice any great hair growth, but it was a great shampoo aside from that. The smell was good and I liked that it was sulfate free. It didnu2019t dry out my scalp, but it did remove my hair color significantly, probably in part due to being instructed to wash my ends as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did not really change my hair much, but it did dry it out quite a bit. It didn't change how much hair I shed, however it smells fantastic and you don't need much at all to get a good lather. I received this product for review, but I do think it would work much better for someone with a different hair type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really works! The pictures speak for themselves. I received the entire set (shampoo, conditioner, serum, and gummies) for free in exchange for my honest opinion. I can honestly say Iu2019m blown away! Iu2019m a recovering cancer patient, who lost all my hair due to chemotherapy. I was therefore very excited to try this set. In just 3 weeks, my hair has grown a tremendous amount. The pictures were taken exactly 3 weeks and 1 day apart. The shampoo smells great and lathers nicely. Yes, it is on the pricier side, but in my opinion, you get what you pay for. The products are natural and that means a whole lot to me given the toxins my body has been through in the last year. I highly recommend this shampoo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product for my honest review. This shampoo and conditioner is amazing. I have curly colored hair. I love that this is a color-safe shampoo. Secondly, my hair is incredibly soft, even after air drying; The B-silk protein really does work. And the scent is out of this world.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this  GRO Revitalizing Shampoo for about 4 weeks now and I am in love. This shampoo smells amazing and you only need about a quarter size amount for a great lather. My hair is less frizzy, softer, and shiny. I also love that it's made my hair fuller, longer, and smooth. I started having thinning a few years ago after a surgery and have already started seeing a difference. I would normally never spend so much on a shampoo but already know that I'll be continuing to purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample for free in exchange for a review from Influenster.     I feel like this review wonu2019t reflect on the product accurately as I have only been able to use it for 3 weeks, and hair isnu2019t growing anywhere in 3 weeks because of a shampoo.  So I will tell you what I can   The smell: itu2019s delish.  Itu2019s a light candy orange scent.  Almost reminds me of a scent a very popular bathbomb company carries in the winter as a body wash.   I love it.  I constantly sniff my hair.     It lathers well and only a small amount needed to obtain a great lather.    It cleans well.  My hair feels clean after I rinse and doesnu2019t feel like a residue is left behind.   The negatives.   My hair is VERY tangly.    Itu2019s seemed quite dry since switching from Pureology to this.     Hair growth: Iu2019ve not seen any yet.  But itu2019s only been 3 weeks. I feel with this type of product, a review really needs a good 60-90 days worth of product use to provide an accurate opinion based on experience.     I will continue to use this product and I have high hopes in this product line.  The ingredients are great and I trust in the company itself.   I will update late summer and hopefully have great hair growth success.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange for my opinion! I have been using this  GRO Revitalizing Shampoo for about 3 weeks now. I also love that it's made my hair fuller, longer, and smooth!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest it didnu2019t help my hair grow but is good shampoo cleans hair well.

reviews.review_text: Lathers nicely and smells amazing. Iu2019ve only been using this for 3 weeks now and my hair has been noticeably less frizzy.  Would recommend to anyone looking for smooth hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I will definitely continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this shampoo!! The smell is so nice and it lathers wonderfully! My hair is fuller already but this reduced the amount of hair loss I regularly experienced, not to mention sparked some rapid growth in length!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this shampoo for about 3 weeks now and I have to say it smells really nice. It also seems to have helped my hair be less frizzy and definitely a lot smoother. I haven't noticed a big difference in terms of shedding however I'll definitely continue using it as the ingredients are super clean and it's been working very well for my hair so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a complimentary product sent to me from Influenster to test and for my honest review. I have been trying this shampoo for a few weeks, but I have not seen any big changes for me personally. I have to use a bit more of the product than whatu2019s recommended to put on the hair since my hair is long. I also have somewhat thin hair, unfortunately it got dried up and tangled a lot when I first used it. So Iu2019m thinking this product would be better for someone with a thicker hair texture. However, this shampoo leaves your hair feeling really clean and it smells nice. I will continue to use it, but I think this is for certain hair types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster to try out. Itu2019s not something  Iu2019d normally purchase but as Iu2019m growing my hair out I thought it would be helpful.  The product has a nice sweet scent- kind of candy like. Scalp felt clean. Needed to use way more than the recommend amount of product so I donu2019t feel this would last long (hair is past shoulders).  Hair desperately needed conditioner after use. This is not a shampoo you can just use and not follow up with a really nice conditioning product. I donu2019t feel it helped with hair shedding/loss. Felt I had more loss in my hair brush and in shower. Also felt it left my hair brassy (I have double process platinum locks). The shampoo along with the conditioner did make my hair more shiny. Hair also did seem to have more volume, but made hair frizzy. Over all Iu2019d give it 2 stars just for the shine and scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for about a month now - the smell is nice, the packaging is so cute, and Iu2019ve noticed a slight change in my hair. Iu2019ve struggled with fine, thinning hair and I feel like my hair was felt thicker than usual. Still need to use for a while longer to know for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a nice citrus scent, reminds me of grapefruit. I have been using this product for close to a month and have noticed a huge difference in the texture of my hair. My hair is less frizzy and dry feeling without the feeling of my hair being weighted down with product. I have long thick hair as it is so I have not noticed a difference in length or thickness. I would recommend to others just based on the reduction of frizz and the increase in moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I want to point out is the packaging, it is a beautiful soft touch bottle. As soon as you apply some to your hand youu2019ll notice the strong citrusy scent it has and the texture is thick and doesnu2019t lather too much. For the price, Iu2019d say itu2019s too much but for the amount of time Iu2019ve been using it, I havenu2019t noticed much hair loss like with other shampoos. It does make my hair feel soft and more denser. It has grown a bit. I do recommend just to try it out if price isnu2019t a deal breaker for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this shampoo. Iu2019ve been using Davines products for the last 5 years, and an extremely sudsy shampoo is a big change. The scent is very prominent, and stays in the hair. I donu2019t love the fragrance, but it isnu2019t so bothersome that I would stop using it. Since using the foam, shampoo, and conditioner over the last few weeks Iu2019ve noticed less overall shedding, and my hair looks fuller once dry. Iu2019ll continue to use this as long as I see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using these products for a little bit over a month Andi can truly say Iu2019ve noticed a difference. I have a gentle Receding hairline and after this short period of time Iu2019m seeing growth. The product makes my hair feel soft and it smells amazing. The shampoo and conditioner are part of my hair care routine now.  Ive recently started using the hair foam as well. The biotin gummyu2019s taste good and donu2019t leave a bad aftertaste. I would definitely recommend these products! The packaging is also very pretty. I received these products in exchange of my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this shampoo for a couple of weeks and I haven't seen a different yet. I think that I need to keep using it longer to see if It will help my hair grow .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is really beautiful and I love that the shampoo comes out the bottom not the top. It smells great, kinda like blood orange. It works like a really good conditioner and feels nice and thick on the hair when applied. Cleans well and leaves hair feeling smooth. I have quite thick, dry, frizzy hair and have noticed that during the month I used it, it grew substantially (like an inch or two) and also began to feel a lot healthier. I would recommend but feel that the price is high for shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For some time Iu2019ve noticed that Iu2019ve had an increase of hair loss and when I mop/vacuum itu2019s just hair strands.  Although Iu2019ve tried the product going on 4 weeks Iu2019ve seen a decrease of less hair loss and noticed more body on hair and hair growth.  Looking forward to the next few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a complimentary product sent to me from Influenster for my honest review. I love the beautiful and elegant packaging. I used this product for a month and while I didnu2019t notice any hair growth, my hair is MUCH softer...normally it is very coarse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very thick long hair I used this for a few weeks and didnu2019t notice any more hair growth than usual (expected because itu2019s a shampoo) it also doesnu2019t feel like it cleans very well and leaves a sticky residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start, I have medium length, blonde treated hair. The packaging is nice I like the color of the bottle. The shampoo smells great- very much like creamsicle.
