reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I been struggling a lot with thinning hair and extreme hair loss after been ill and going keto diet it was so extreme i tried everything you can think of.. until this shampoo i been using for about 3 weeks and I can definitely see a difference baby hair growing and a lot less breakage incredible shampoo and smells amazing seriously a must try and you wont regret!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this shampoo for a little over a month.  While I donu2019t notice any increase in volume or thickness, my hair has grown quite a bit since I started using it.  So much so that I got a trim and thought she cut it too short, but a week later it already grew!  The fragrance is a pitch citrus, which I love and it gives a very spa-like experience.  Definitely give this a try if you are trying to grow your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before my review, I like to inform that I have dry and thick hair. The packaging is so pretty! I love the scent of this shampoo! Itu2019s a strong lemon citrus scent, so those who are sensitive to fragrance may not like it. When using the shampoo, it lathered and rinsed nicely. After every wash, my hair felt soft and there was a nice shine. It has been a few weeks and I feel like I havenu2019t seen any difference in regards to thicker, fuller and longer looking hair. I may still have to use it longer to notice some change. Overall, I am enjoying this shampoo a lot and would recommend to a friend who loves vegan products and do not care for the price tag (as it is on the pricier end for the amount of product).

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long straight oily hair and I shed A LOT so I was excited to try this product. The shampoo is clear and has a strong scent...so if you arenu2019t into scents, this product is not for you. The product doesnu2019t lather as much as my other shampoos so i didnu2019t realize that maybe I wasnu2019t washing off all the product and my hair would get oily very fast. But by the 3rd week either my hair got used to it or I got better at washing it off. I used the shampoo, condition, serum and biotin for 3 weeks.... besides the oily issue, my hair looked shiny and I do feel like I shed less (meaning it isnu2019t all over the floor at the end of the week). While I do think my hair is shiny and isnu2019t shedding as much I donu2019t think I can keep up with the price of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. I am trying to grow my hair longer and thicken it prior to my wedding. I have noticed reduced hair fall with this shampoo. You donu2019t need much. It lathers really well, and a little goes a long way! Thatu2019s important with this product because itu2019s very expensive. It costs more than I would ordinarily pay for a shampoo, so I donu2019t know that I will purchase this again. It has a pleasant smell and leaves my hair feeling soft and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

The shampoo doesn't suds up as much as others which is hard to get used to at first but it gives my hair and scalp a boost. I only need a little bit and rub it into my scalp. My hair feels and smells awesome thanks to this product line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this shampoo it definitely help give volume to dull thin hair. It improves hair texture and leaves hair soft smooth. It smells like gummies and i love this scent. My hair looks shiny and feels strong. It is very nourishing and helps hydrate my dry damage hair. I really love it and will recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating is because it gives extra moisture to my hair and I try to avoid washing my hair too much .  This is truly a great product!!  Excited to finish it up.

reviews.review_text: After using this shampoo my hair did feel cleaner and had less fallout. Being sulfate free is a great thing but already having thick hair I didn't see a big difference.

reviews.review_title: Buy it, you won't regret it

reviews.review_text: I really liked the results when using the shampoo and conditioner but I am not a fan of the fruity smell it has. Other than that is amazing.

reviews.review_title: Healthy feeling hair but flattens my waves.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary product from Influenster for testing proposes. I will say I absolutely LOVE the smell of this shampoo. My hair always feels softer when I use it. The only complaint really is that it doesnu2019t work the greatest for my type of curly/wavy hair. My waves kind of go flat with it even though my hair still has body to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Vegamour in exchange for my honest opinion. Used with Gro Revitalizing Conditioner, Gro biotin gummies and Gro scalp detoxifying hair treatment serum. I have been using it for over 3 weeks now. I was really excited to receive this product as I have very thin type 1a hair and due to a chronic health problem can lose it more than I'd like. Plus I tend to lose more hair when stressed and this has been a really stressful year. If you are sensitive to fragrance, this isn't for you. I'm sensitive to fragrance and when the box first arrived it triggered my asthma a bit and I was worried I wouldn't be able to use it. I have gotten used to it, but the scent is still really strong enough to make me seriously wonder whether I'd purchase it. It smells amazing, like oranges, but it's just too much. The packaging is a really nice pink and gold, looks really high end. This foams really well for a clean shampoo but I have oily roots from seborrheic dermatitis and the hard water in my area is a 100/100 on the scale. This doesn't clean enough so I have to use with my usual shampoo. The vegan silk is really good, feels just like regular silk so impressed with that. I do think this makes my hair thicker when I use it with the conditioner, but if I stop using it doesn't last. I haven't noticed any difference in the amount of hair I'm losing or anything looking fuller (I feel like anything different is more how I parted my hair than the product), but I have more product left and plan to finish this and see if it works. If it does I'll update my review, but instead of purchasing this I'd probably look to the Gro serum and wash it out, even though it's a leave in, to get around the strong fragrance issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is great! The smell is so yummy, like the smarties candy. The fragrance sticks in your hair and I can smell it the next day - not a bad thing of course!   I have been using it for a few weeks so far, and it hasnu2019t stripped my colored hair or dried it out. I would recommend this to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that itu2019s cruelty free and u201cfree ofu201d a lot of stuff such as parabens and sulfates. It seemed to have helped my damaged hair as I do have a lot of split ends but it does not seem like it helped thicken my hair. I even used it in addition to the conditioner, serum, and hair gummies. I did love the scent of it, smelled like grapefruits to me and the consistency was good, and lathered decently despite not having sulfates.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this shampoo. It gets my hair clean but does not leave it feeling stripped. And the smell is heavenly. I just cut my hair short short, so the bottle should last awhile. I know it takes awhile to see results, but I feel like Iu2019ve seen less shedding using this and the conditioner along with the foam. It is pricey, but from what I am seeing so far, I will repurchase when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product from Influenster*   Iu2019ve been using this shampoo for a couple of weeks now & I really love the smell and how soft it makes my hair but Iu2019m not really sure if I can tell a difference in the length of my hair yet but I will continue to use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the GRO Revitalizing Shampoo complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. Honestly,  I Love this shampoo. I have been using it along with the conditioner for about a month. I noticed the difference the first time I used it. My hair is super soft and I have noticed less damage to my hair. Will definitely continue to use..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the shampoo, conditioner, serum, and gummyu2019s every day for a month, I have noticed that my hair has a thicker feeling. That being said, my hair also felt much more weighed down and it lost some of its natural volume on the top that I normally can see. Iu2019m not so sure if the thicker feeling outweighs the less volume. The shampoo lathers very nicely and rinsed out well without it sticking to your hair. The biggest negative to this product is the scent. I normally enjoy a fruity smell, but this is overpowering and stays in your hair even the entire next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing can we talk about the PACKAGING first????? GORGEOUS!? Fabulous????idk how too describe it and the SMELL GURLLLL the smell is like your in a colorful garden with all type of flowers and a rainbow and the birds tweeting all around i be getting so happy when i use it the smell just refreshes me and gets me happy and it already stopped my hair from falling and people are noticing the difference and telling me your hair have gotten thicker. WILL DEFINITELY BUY AGAIN AND HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo smells amazing. It works very well and lathers nicely for how natural the ingredients are! It has made my hair grow along with the conditioner serum and the vitamins. I received this complimentary of Influenster and Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I replaced my daily shampoo with this for a month to really test it and see if it works. Along with the conditioner and hair serum, I do notice a growth and difference in my hair. I have baby hairs that werenu2019t there before. Also, the scent is so pretty and light! I really enjoy it and it does work!   ** I Received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review **

I wasnu2019t sure how I would like this because Iu2019m pretty picky about shampoo but it smells so good and makes my hair so soft! I also need a shampoo that I can go a couple days in between washing and doesnu2019t leave my hair looking greasy... this works!!!!  I have already signed up for a recurring shipment

reviews.review_title: Too early to tell if this has an impact
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have only been using this product for a few weeks, so it's hard to know if it's doing anything to improve the thickness of my hair.   The pros: Gorgeous packaging, lovely smell The neutrals: Lather isn't the best, but not the worst. I feel like I have to add water to my hair to get the best lather. The cons: My hair feels pretty stripped in the shower after rinsing. The conditioner restores softness, but usually, I like my hair to feel clean, but not stripped.  I haven't noticed any dramatic results to the style-ability of my hair or the texture after drying. I feel like my Living Proof shampoo made my hair slightly softer/less frizzy than this, but I don't notice any negative effects either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Shampoo smells good but too fragranced for my liking. It did clean and give me shine

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do genuinely like this shampoo.  I usually use more shampoo than conditioner but I didnu2019t have to with this product.  Itu2019s very effective in smaller amounts and my hair felt very clean but not stripped after use and I wash my hair every day.  I did knock a star off because of the scent and how much there is of it.  I like scented hair products, I also like fruity sweet scented hair products.  This stuff is soooooo strongly scented it was almost to much for me.  While I did enjoy the product I also donu2019t think I would be willing to pay this price for shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this shampoo! The scent was my favorite thing about it. Although the shampoo lathers well, and rinses clean easily, I found that it makes my hair greasy and weighs it down. With hair that's already fine and thin, I don't need something that is going to weigh it down. I haven't noticed whether it has helped bolster any growth, as I've only been using it a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very drying on my hair. Washing for 60 seconds is not ideal and wonu2019t happen. The smell was too strong for me. I did use for 3 weeks and my hair does feel a bit thicker (when used in combo with other Vegamour products)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influester & Vegamour in exchange for an honest review.  First off, the smell of the product is amazing. It lasts throughout the day without being overwhelming.  I love that it doesnu2019t make my hair feel stripped afterwards but still feel clean.  I have definitely noticed a difference in not as much hair falling out as usual.  I canu2019t say my hair is growing faster but it does feel more voluminous.  I will definitely be buying the shampoo again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was kind of hoping I wouldn't like this shampoo as much as I do since it's a little on the expensive side, but it's really great! A little seems to go a long way, and I love the smell. I jave sensitive and dry skin, and so gar I haven't really noticed a huge difference from that perspective, but it definitely hasn't made it any worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this product. It is beautiful however it left my hair feeling dry and experiencing some dandruff that I have never had before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve really enjoyed using this product twice a week for the past month. It leaves my hair soft & full & when used with other Vegamour products I can definitely tell that my hair is thicker. Iu2019m currently pregnant but am really excited to see what this product can do when Iu2019m postpartum & potentially expediting hair loss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: I really love the scent of the shampoo. This is my first time using a vegan hair product and Iu2019m impressed. I feel like it is too early to say if itu2019s helped my hair grow but it definitely has made it feel more silky and manageable. I only use a small amount as I have short hair so it should last me quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is great for my color treated and slightly damaged hair! I definitely have noticed that my hair is thicker, softer, and shinier while using this product. I recently started the curly girl method on my type 2b curls and was happy to learn this shampoo and conditioner is CGM approved! No silicones, parabens or heavy ingredients that weigh down curls and build up in your hair. Also the smell is divine! It has a floral/fruity scent that reminds me of roses and strawberries. Overall I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for fuller, healthier hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this shampoo is wonderful, reminiscent of grapefruit. It lathered well, rinsed out easily, and cleaned my hair. However, it did leave my hair very dry. It would have been great if they had gone to the next step of creating the shampoo in bar form, rather than in a plastic bottle. I have itchy scalp, and unfortunately, this product did not help with that. I got this product as a free sample through Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! The smell is so amazing. It smells fruity/ sweet. The scent is not too strong but strong enough to smell it throughout the day. My hair feels softer since I have started using their products everyday. It hasn't been enough days to know for sure if it is helping my thinning areas, but I feel like it is already helping. My hair feels like it actually has some volume to it. It says to use a quarter size amount of shampoo and conditioner as well, so I feel like these will last a long time. I will be buying these products again when I get close to running out. They are a little pricey, but with the small amount that you use I feel like it is worth it. The overall experience while using this product it worth it alone. I feel really relaxed and pampered when I use the products. The whole aromatherapy experience combined with the instructions they give, really makes the experience amazing. I can smell this product on my hair throughout the entire day. I'm glad that my hair is actually less damaged looking and shiny as well. You have to try their products, they are amazing, trust me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am impressed with this vegan shampoo. Iu2019ve tried soooooo many of them and gave up on them after a week. This one I am using for the 3d week already, and It seems to work. It makes my hair very soft, the scalp isnu2019t itchy, and the most important thing, my hair isnu2019t crazy tangled, as it usually is. I like the scent of it, It smells like a candy. I would recommend this product to people that are in transition from conventional to more natural product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried a lot of different Shampoos and conditioners for my hair and this is by far the best Iu2019ve used!! The smell is refreshing and it leaves my hair feeling AMAZING! Will be using from now on.

reviews.review_title: Buy it! You wonu2019t be sorry.

reviews.review_text: I canu2019t speak on whether or not it helps your hair grow because Iu2019ve only been using it about two weeks. Buuuut it smells amazing. It leaves my hair soft and shiny and somehow it feels stronger?? Itu2019s easier to brush than with other shampoos. I just love this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really love the smell of this shampoo and how quickly it lathers up! I do feel like my hair has gotten a little thicker in the 3 weeks Iu2019ve been using it, but I think it doesnu2019t keep my curls all that well. But itu2019s still really nice to use.

reviews.review_title: Good for different hair than mine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The shampoo and conditioner both have a very nice but light scent. They leave my hair feeling strong, shiny, and smelling great. After a week of daily use however I did notice that the curl was not behaving in my fine hair as well as it does when I use my curl shampoo/conditioners, so while I liked the product I personally wonu2019t continue using it. However I would recommend this for people who want to strengthen their hair and perhaps donu2019t have the finest, finickiest curls ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this shampoo itu2019s smells really good which is a huge plus I use it three times a week for roughly three weeks so far I notice my hair feels much healthier not longer as of yet but there is definitely less hair in my drain whou2019s is huge I hope to see even better results soon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this shampoo. Iu2019ve been using it every other day for about 2-3 weeks now. It makes my hair so soft and shiny! Iu2019m not 100% sure I will be able to afford to purchase once I run out. I received this product complimentary for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!!   I have been using it for about 3 weeks and I can tell it has made my hair healthier, shiner and longer.   The scent is wonderful (reminds me of orange cream sickles). I would recommend this shampoo to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo works well and leaves my hair feeling nice, but I haven't noticed any difference in thickness or strength in the 30 days I've been using it. I'm not sure about the smell of it; it's not bad, but it's not good, either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, smell is amazing, the ingredients work well I can feel my hair change after every wash, the texture of my hair is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free through Influenster. As a person who isn't a fan of strong scents, the Vegamour shampoo and condition smells nice (almost floral) and is really light. For such a gentle product,this shampoo cleans! There was no product oil residue leftover using this product and my hair felt nice afterwards. However, I have thick kinky-coily type 4 hair, and the price for this product being around $48 for 8 ounces is really expensive when there are other products that are just as clean/without sulfates on the market. This product may not be accessible for the average consumer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from Influenster and Vegamour in exchange for my honest review. I really liked the shampoo. The consistency is good, not too thick not too runny. It looks like a clear gel. Has a strong smell of tangerines but it doesnu2019t linger. I do like the smell a lot but if you are sensitive to smells, that may be a problem.  My hair is thick, wavy, dry and frizzy. I have been using the shampoo for at least 3 weeks already and my hair looks healthy with less frizz. I do have to wash my hair more often, I assume that the shampoo is not stripping my hair of the natural oils and that is the reason.  I do recommend the shampoo, the only negative thing is the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenster and I was excited to try out a new shampoo. For starters, itu2019s smells really good ! It honestly kind of smells like gummy bears to me but I donu2019t mind the sweet smell. I also really enjoyed the minimal packing as it looks cute in my shower. I can not tell if it made a real difference in my hair as far as thickness. I already have semi thick hair. It is kind of pricey so I am not sure if I would personally repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this. My hair is thick, shiny, and smooth after a month using this product. I used it twice a week. Love the light citrus smell. Cleaned my hair and made my scalp feel clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this shampoo complimentary to test in exchange for my honest review. After testing for nearly a month, using every other day, I have a positive opinion about the product. It smells good, has a nice consistency and seems to get my hair really clean. I havenu2019t seen any additional growth or thickening of my hair just yet, but Iu2019m optimistic Iu2019ll see those results soon. Overall, I like the shampoo and would purchase it in the future.

reviews.review_title: Best scent of Shampoo I've ever had!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I received this product to try for free was pleasantly surprised by the quality and the features. Although I'm not vegan I do appreciate that Vegamour has made a vegan product and has clearly supplied other health/wellness information on their packaging, website, and info sheets they provided. The scent is strong if that's something you like and paired with the conditioner it leaves your hair really silky. I've already recommended this product to a vegan friend and I know many people who I could see using this shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So i received this product complimentary from Influenster. This product is good but just ok. The shampoo, although it smells amazing does not larger unless a lot is used. I have thick wavy hair and I never felt that all of it was shampooed. As well, it does weigh down curls and makes them non existent. It does make your hair soft and smell great, but it just simply isnu2019t for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this, it smells amazing, but it dries my hair out like no other!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Vegamour Shampoo as a free complimentary sample from Influenster! At first made my hair feel dry using shampoo but after I used conditioner along with it, it has made a huge difference in my hair!! Also it smells AMAZING & lasts for days actually!!

reviews.review_title: My hair is feeling Clean, Healthy And DELICIOUS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this set in exchange for my honest review. So the packaging is so adorable, the smell is amazing, did wonders to my hair. First off a lot goes a long way and it suds up so good were my hair was already feel nice while i was still massaging. Made my hair silky soft, shiny, and tamed down my frizz and wave an not to mention my hair smelled delicious. It says it smells like gummy bears which it does but way better lol.  The only reason i gave 4 stars was cause it says color safe which it faded my hair so quick, i just dyed my hair (bright red) a few days before receiving, and now I'm light pink an you can see some blonde showing. Other then that my hair has never felt this amazing, nice looking an smelling delicious. I will continue using to see if my hair gets fuller, but i could tell my hair grew faster cause i already need my roots touched up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: My hair has never felt softer and it smells amazing. Incredible product.  Cons: IT COMES IN PLASTIC. For a company whose entire brand is about being vegan and caring about the planet and animals, it is completely useless when they are pumping out plastic containers. Plastic is hurting our wild places and killing animals. Itu2019s horrible, and this company contributes to that instead of using a different material.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Vegamour Shampoo as a free complimentary sample from Influenster and I love it. The shampoo is creamy and lathers extremely well. It has a lovely scent that will pull you in. Its smooth texture feels good on the scalp. I felt a few tingles everytime I used it but could be because I tend to massage and get in the scalp. After rinsing my hair felt soft, fresh and clean. I have used this item about 5 times now in the past 3 weeks and am very satisfied with it. I recommend it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. First off, this product smells amazing! I also love how it suds up and makes you feel like itu2019s actually cleansing your hair. I didnu2019t notice growth necessarily however I only wash my hair 1-2x a week so maybe with more consistent use it would be more noticeable. It did make my hair super soft and shiny though! I would definitely recommend and repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing !! Itu2019s my first time trying this and I know you need more time to see hair growth but my hair doesnu2019t fall out as much anymore!! But I will update on it !! Itu2019s pricey!! Yes but sooo worth it !! Leaves my hair feeling full and smells absolutely amazing for days !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZINGGGGGGG I LOVE ITu2026. The smell is citrusy and the shampoo donu2019t strip your hair at all will be buying again for sure recommend

reviews.review_title: OMG I CANT BELIEVE ITS IN SEPHORA!!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: OMG I CANT BELIEVE ITS IN SEPHORA!!!!! my most favorite shampoo and conditioner of all time and FINALLY i can get points on it through sephora. THANK YOU GUYS!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in my Influenster Vox Box and it was the BEST one yet! This shampoo is my own go to product. It smells SO good and makes my hair smell amazing for days. Iu2019ve been looking for a shampoo like this for so long. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the smell of this shampoo, and it did a great job at making my hair feel exceptionally clean! The packaging is also sleek and pretty. It isn't my favorite shampoo of all time, but still a great product.

Iu2019ve been using it for about 2 weeks now and can see a significant difference in how my hair feels and looks, I have short, thin hair but this has definitely provided me more volume and my hair feels super healthy!

reviews.review_text: I was surprised at how well this shampoo works! Never seen a thick, clear shampoo before and had my doubts. This shampoo exceeded my expectations! Smells wonderful also. It left my hair shiny and smooth! LOVE THIS!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! The smell, how it leaves my hair, everything! Amazing ingredients, safe, amazing presentation!  A must try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Must try!! I loved the smell of this shampoo. My hair felt so smooth after using it.. & very mild shampoo as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in LOVE with this shampoo...I been using it for about 3 weeks now and my over processed dry damaged hair has never looked and felt so amazing and soft and my hair has definitely grown a half a inch in just 3 weeks or so...so not only does it work wonders it also smells AMAZING I LOVE Vegamour and will definitely continue using there products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free through Influenster. It is amazing it smells amazing and leaves your hair soft and frizz free highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

Consistency is thick and you don't need to use too much just 1/4 tia enough.  I think the price is a little high but for the benefits it might be worth it.  I haven't yet noticed a difference in growth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for free for my honest review.  I really loved this shampoo. The smell was wonderful and refreshing. From the first use my hair felt softer and not weighed down by product. I have been using it for about 3 weeks now, and my hair is softer and I've noticed it growing faster than normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster to test it out. I personally didnu2019t care for the scent. Itu2019s wasnu2019t too strong it just wasnu2019t something I cared for. Iu2019ve been using it for about three weeks and it does lather well and doesnu2019t feel like it strips your hair of its moisture like other shampoos can. I have really long hair so for me personally the price point is a little high for the size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free to test from Influenster and Vegamour. For starters it smells lovely, I haven't been able to put my finger on it but it's kind of like orange popsicles? But in the best way! I've been using it for about three weeks, probably too soon to judge growth but I did notice more volume and body. As others mention the shampoo is thinner than most brands so just be careful or you'll pour out way too much. It lathers very well so a quarter sized amount is fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster to test it out and have absolutely fallen in love with it. It has a great smell without being overbearing. The size of the bottle is great for the value, Iu2019ve been using it for over 3 weeks and itu2019s still well over 80% full. Iu2019m not sure if Iu2019ve noticed much hair growth in length but I have certainly noticed my hair feeling thicker and healthier. I have curly hair and getting shampoos that work well and donu2019t feel like they are drying my hair out is a struggle, this shampoo worked great with my hair.  I will say be careful when opening the bottle (make sure itu2019s right side up) as the formula is thinner than most shampoos. That being said a little goes very long way further adding to the amount of use you can get from a single bottle.  I would absolutely purchase this for myself after my current bottle runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried Monat for hair growth and I feel this is better for my hair. I donu2019t have to worry about being greasy like I did with monat hair products. My hair is so smooth and I feel like I can go an extra day without washing which I love! I recommend this product! I use the conditioner and the vitamins as well which I think all help with the hair growth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: From the start of using this I already loved it. An now I love it more. This is a great shampoo with lots of benefits , the smell alone is amazing it leaves your hair smelling like orange blossoms, after an during use it left my hair feeling soft, I've only been using for a short time but already my hair feels fuller an I can see new growth.  Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this about 3x a week and it's a very gentle shampoo. My scalp doesn't get dried out and my hair feels soft with it, it see. s like it aids in creating a better environment for healthy hair growth, but that's where it ends. It doesn't boost growth at all. I've measured my normal hair growth before and it's the same speed as normal with no additional thickness or density. It's fine, but if you only need the gentle cleansing then you could easily look elsewhere.   also, the scent is SO strong. Those sensitive to fragrance are likely to have issues with this shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as part of an Influenster campaign and I am in love. The smell is delicious and my hair smells amazing for several days after use. It smells like grapefruit/fruity pebbles to me. Noms!   Itu2019s a luxurious, thick shampoo and you work it into the hair deeply so the phytoactives can penetrate into the scalp to do their work on your hair.   My hair does feel very soft and full after using this for about the last three weeks. I canu2019t say for sure if Iu2019ve noticed hair growth but I didnu2019t have a lot of issues before.   Iu2019ve been pairing it with the Detoxifying serum, conditioner and Biotin Gummies so Iu2019m excited to see the results after continued use.
